Add more integration tests for missing resources

Added some more integration tests for the following resources:
APIService, CertificateSigningRequest, DaemonSet, Endpoints, Events
HorizontalPodAutoscaler, LimitRange, Namespace, PersistentVolumeClaim,
ResourceQuota
